'''Secrets of Good Health''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Secrets of Good Health is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.

|time = 14h
